pr_title: [CALCITE-3815] Add missing SQL standard aggregate functions: EVERY, SO…

timeline.bodyText: nitpicking: keep the indent style for new line, or put them in the same line
timeline.author: DonnyZone

timeline.message: [CALCITE-3815] fixing the SOME and EVERY function to use ReservedFunctionName.

timeline.bodyText:
Please also add INTERSECTION in AGGREGATE EnumSet [1].
[1] 
  
    
      calcite/core/src/main/java/org/apache/calcite/sql/SqlKind.java
    
    
         Line 1159
      in
      4c3cef9
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public static final EnumSet<SqlKind> AGGREGATE =
timeline.author: DonnyZone
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -966,6 +966,9 @@
   /** The {@code FUSION} aggregate function. */
   FUSION,
 
+  /** The {@code INTERSECTION} aggregate function. */
+  INTERSECTION,

replies.bodyText: @DonnyZone  Thank you for the suggestion. I added INTESECTION, to the Aggregate enumset. I also noticed that ANY_VALUE was missing, so added it.
replies.author: HanumathRao

timeline.message: [CALCITE-3815] Add missing SQL standard aggregate functions: EVERY, SOME, INTERSECTION
[CALCITE-3815] Add missing SQL standard aggregate functions: EVERY, SOME, INTERSECTION
